Title: The Gunfighter
Writer: Graham Yost (developed for television by), Graham Yost, Fred Golan, Elmore Leonard (based on the short story "Fire in the Hole" by), Nichelle D. Tramble (executive story editor), Ingrid Escajeda (story editor), Ryan Farley (story editor), Jon Worley (story editor)
Actors: Timothy Olyphant, Nick Searcy, Joelle Carter, Jacob Pitts
Plot: Still recovering from his gunshot, Raylan takes himself off of desk duty when one of Wynn Duffy's associates is involved in a murder. Meanwhile, Ava takes over Boyd's business while he is back in jail.
